20200907_18z._init: 18z Sep 7 (11 AM PDT) — synoptic cycle, F48 max
20200907_18z._rationale: East wind onset evening Sep 7 local (F7), peak overnight F9-F16. hero=F8. Dense hourly coverage F4-F18 captures 2-3h before onset through sustained peak. F0-F3 baseline/buildup, F19-F24 post-peak winding down.

20200908_00z._init: 00z Sep 8 (5 PM PDT Sep 7) — synoptic cycle, F48 max
20200908_00z._rationale: Continuation event. Wind already blowing at init. Peak daytime Sep 8: F18-F30 UTC = 18z is F18, midday is ~F17-F20. hero=F6 (peak of overnight/early morning phase). Dense F0-F24 captures full overnight-through-daytime catastrophic period. Every hour matters in a multi-day wind event.

20220909_18z._init: 18z Sep 9 (11 AM PDT) — synoptic cycle, F48 max
20220909_18z._rationale: East winds already underway at init (started 08 PDT). Morning winds picked up pre-init; peak evening surge F6-F12 (00-06 UTC Sep 10). hero=F9. Dense F0-F16 captures ongoing winds through evening surge and into overnight. F17-F24 for winding down.

20201021_12z._init: 12z Oct 21 (6 AM MDT) — synoptic cycle, F48 max
20201021_12z._rationale: Blowup started ~F6 (18 UTC), peak F10-F18 (22 UTC through 06 UTC Oct 22). hero=F12. 6000 acres/hour spread, crossed Continental Divide overnight. Dense F4-F22 captures full buildup through overnight fire run. F0-F3 morning baseline before winds ramp up.

20211230_06z._init: 06z Dec 30 (11 PM MST Dec 29) — synoptic cycle, F48 max
20211230_06z._rationale: Winds developed mid-morning ~F8-F10. First 911 call 18:09 UTC = F12. Peak 19-22 UTC = F13-F16. Mountain wave sustained 11 hours. hero=F12. Dense F6-F20 captures wind ramp-up through sustained extreme gusts and fire spread. F0-F5 overnight baseline, F21-F24 late evening winding down.

20220422_12z._init: 12z Apr 22 (6 AM MDT) — synoptic cycle, F48 max
20220422_12z._rationale: Red Flag Warning 09 MDT (F3). Winds ramping F3-F6, peak F8-F15 (20-03 UTC). hero=F10. Prescribed fire escape merged during extreme winds 60-74 mph. Dense F3-F18 captures Red Flag period through evening wind maximum. F0-F2 pre-RFW baseline.

20240226_12z._init: 12z Feb 26 (6 AM CST) — synoptic cycle, F48 max
20240226_12z._rationale: Winds building all morning F2-F6. Ignition 20:20 UTC = F8. Cold front passage ~20:15 UTC = F8 (wind shift). Peak spread F8-F16. hero=F10. Dense F4-F18 captures wind ramp-up, ignition, cold front wind shift, and peak spread period. F0-F3 morning baseline, F19-F24 overnight diminishing.

20240227_12z._init: 12z Feb 27 (6 AM CST) — synoptic cycle, F48 max
20240227_12z._rationale: Post-frontal. Winds calm overnight, pick back up F2 (14 UTC). Peak afternoon F6-F12 (18-00 UTC). hero=F8. Fire expanded 500K to 850K+ acres, crossed into OK. Dense F2-F14 captures full wind ramp through peak spread. F0-F1 early morning calm baseline.

20210629_12z._init: 12z Jun 29 (5 AM PDT) — synoptic cycle, F48 max
20210629_12z._rationale: Absolute peak of heat dome. Morning heating ramps F0-F4, peak afternoon F8-F12 (20-00 UTC = 1-5 PM PDT). hero=F8. Lytton record set mid-afternoon. Include F0-F14 for full diurnal heating cycle through early evening cooling onset. Original was very sparse (only F4,6,8) — expanding significantly.

20210628_12z._init: 12z Jun 28 (5 AM PDT) — synoptic cycle, F48 max
20210628_12z._rationale: Portland 116F record set mid-afternoon (~F8-F10). Ridge building all day. Peak 20-00 UTC = F8-F12. hero=F10. Include F0-F14 for full diurnal heating cycle. Original was sparse (only F6,8,10,12) — expanding to hourly coverage through peak heating and early evening.

20250704_00z._rationale: MCV developing from overnight storms at init. Peak rainfall 06-12 UTC = F6-F12. Flash flooding onset 09-10 UTC = F9-F10. Guadalupe R 26ft in 45min. hero=F8.
